amendment.description: Amendment to direct states to include in their end of the fiscal year report the number of recipients who received additional federal or state means-tested benefits during their subsidized employment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 115-187 to direct states to include in their end of the fiscal year report the number of recipients who received additional federal or state means-tested benefits during their subsidized employment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davidson amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 264 - 147 (Roll no. 321).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Davidson amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 264 - 147 (Roll no. 321).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Davidson.
